text: "Many Rivers to Cross" is a 1969 song by Jamaican singer Jimmy Cliff. It was taken from his self-titled album Jimmy Cliff. It was used in the 1972 movie The Harder They Come. It was later covered by many artists including UB40 in 1983, Cher in 1993 and Annie Lennox in 2008. title: Many Rivers to Cross
